reviews.text:
Good iced coffee. Decent Kaya toast. Check box (Kaya toast). Checked ✔️

It's food court adjacent location. So expect food level ambience, service and food quality. The store has seating too but it was full.  But plenty seating outside the store in the actual food court. No sweat.

Toast box, do you srsly think it's acceptable for ALL your takeaway cups to constantly be leaking to this extent and scalding us???
Almost $3 and yet you cant even R&D a decent, spill-free packaging. I would rather you give us the kopitiam style plastic bag pls

If you're new, the food ordering system and menu might take some getting used to. However, the dishes are priced fair, taste great, and come in good portions. The coffee and tea are good too, so I'd recommend getting one along with your food. Come here if you're looking for some local food without frills that makes you full and happy. Highly recommended  :)

Horrible rushed service, eggs was overcooked and had to wait 10 mins for a new batch. servers preparing the drink was in a foul mood and just slammed the drinks on the tray, resulting in a mess that i had to clean up. horrible experience, will never come back
Got the traditional kaya toast set. Kopi was just ok. Had better kopi at other places. I don't like runny eggs. Plastic individual soy sauce and pepper for dine in option. It's not worth the price.
